record.title: DESIGNATING MARCH 2007 AS "GO DIRECT MONTH"

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to consideration of S. Res. 67.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
